summary: This release brings exciting new ways to connect with the beta program and each other, launching our new Grove Messages system for cross-app communication. We've made significant strides in security and stability across the entire platform, while also introducing helpful features like interactive demos and a polished FAQ. Overall, this update focuses on creating a more welcoming, secure, and feature-rich experience as we prepare for wider availability.
